data_table.description: Health and Life Profile (Interpersonal Support Evaluation List and Lubben Social Network Scale), Exam 2. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: HPAAFLAG
variable.description: 1= if form is present [Health and Life Profile (Interpersonal Support Evaluation List and Lubben Social Network Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPAACY
variable.description: Contact year [4] [Health and Life Profile (Interpersonal Support Evaluation List and Lubben Social Network Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPAA01
variable.description: How do you feel about life as a whole? Q1 [Health and Life Profile (Interpersonal Support Evaluation List and Lubben Social Network Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPAA02
variable.description: On a scale of zero (0) to ten (10), how satisfied are you with the meaning and purpose of your life? Q2 [Health and Life Profile (Interpersonal Support Evaluation List and Lubben Social Network Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPAA03
variable.description: Most of my friends are more interesting than I am. Q3 [Health and Life Profile (Interpersonal Support Evaluation List and Lubben Social Network Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPAA04
variable.description: When I feel lonely, there are several people I can talk to. Q4 [Health and Life Profile (Interpersonal Support Evaluation List and Lubben Social Network Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPAA05
variable.description: I often meet or talk with family or friends. Q5 [Health and Life Profile (Interpersonal Support Evaluation List and Lubben Social Network Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPAA06
variable.description: I feel like I'm not always included by my circle of friends. Q6 [Health and Life Profile (Interpersonal Support Evaluation List and Lubben Social Network Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPAA07
variable.description: There really is no one who can give me an objective view of how I'm handling my problems. Q7 [Health and Life Profile (Interpersonal Support Evaluation List and Lubben Social Network Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPAA08
variable.description: If I were sick and needed someone (friend, family member, or acquaintance to take me to the doctor, I would have trouble finding someone. Q8 [Health and Life Profile (Interpersonal Support Evaluation List and Lubben Social Network Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPAA09
variable.description: If I were sick, I could easily find someone to help me with my daily chores. Q9 [Health and Life Profile (Interpersonal Support Evaluation List and Lubben Social Network Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPAA10
variable.description: When I need suggestions on how to deal with a personal problem, I know someone I can turn to. Q10 [Health and Life Profile (Interpersonal Support Evaluation List and Lubben Social Network Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPAA11
variable.description: I don't often get invited to do things with others. Q11 [Health and Life Profile (Interpersonal Support Evaluation List and Lubben Social Network Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPAA12
variable.description: Most of my friends are most successful at making changes in their lives than I am. Q12 [Health and Life Profile (Interpersonal Support Evaluation List and Lubben Social Network Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPAA13
variable.description: If I had to go out of town for a few weeks, it would be difficult to find someone who would look after my house or apartment (the plants, pets, garden, Etc.). Q13 [Health and Life Profile (Interpersonal Support Evaluation List and Lubben Social Network Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPAA14
variable.description: There is really no one I can trust to give me good financial advice. Q14 [Health and Life Profile (Interpersonal Support Evaluation List and Lubben Social Network Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPAA15
variable.description: I am more satisfied with my life than most people are with theirs. Q15 [Health and Life Profile (Interpersonal Support Evaluation List and Lubben Social Network Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPAA16
variable.description: It would be difficult to find someone who would lend me their car for a few hours. Q16 [Health and Life Profile (Interpersonal Support Evaluation List and Lubben Social Network Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPAA17
variable.description: There is at least one person I know whose advice I really trust. Q17 [Health and Life Profile (Interpersonal Support Evaluation List and Lubben Social Network Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPAA18
variable.description: I have a hard time keeping pace with my friends. Q18 [Health and Life Profile (Interpersonal Support Evaluation List and Lubben Social Network Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPAA19
variable.description: How many relatives do you see or learn from at least once a month? (note: relatives include husband/wife, children and grandchildren, brothers, sisters, parents, in-laws, aunts, uncles, and cousins). Q19 [Health and Life Profile (Interpersonal Support Evaluation List and Lubben Social Network Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPAA20
variable.description: Tell me about the relative with whom you have the most contact. How often do you see or hear from that person? Q20 [Health and Life Profile (Interpersonal Support Evaluation List and Lubben Social Network Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPAA21
variable.description: How many relatives do you feel close to? That is, how many of them do you feel at ease with, can talk to about private matters, or can call on for help? Q21 [Health and Life Profile (Interpersonal Support Evaluation List and Lubben Social Network Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPAA22
variable.description: Do you have any close friends? That is, do you have any friends with whom you feel at ease, can talk to about private matters, or can call on for help? If so, how many? Q22 [Health and Life Profile (Interpersonal Support Evaluation List and Lubben Social Network Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPAA23
variable.description: How many of these friends do you see or hear from at least once a month? Q23 [Health and Life Profile (Interpersonal Support Evaluation List and Lubben Social Network Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPAA24
variable.description: Tell me about the friend with whom you have the most contact. How often do you see or hear from that person? Q24 [Health and Life Profile (Interpersonal Support Evaluation List and Lubben Social Network Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPAA25
variable.description: When you have an important decision to make, how frequently do you have someone you can talk to about it? Q25 [Health and Life Profile (Interpersonal Support Evaluation List and Lubben Social Network Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPAA26
variable.description: When other people you know have an important decision to make, how frequently do they talk to you about it? Q26 [Health and Life Profile (Interpersonal Support Evaluation List and Lubben Social Network Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPAA27
variable.description: Does anybody rely on you to do something for them each day? For example: shopping, cooking dinner, doing repairs, cleaning house, providing child care, Etc.? Q27 [Health and Life Profile (Interpersonal Support Evaluation List and Lubben Social Network Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPAA28
variable.description: How frequently do you help anybody with things like shopping, filling out forms, doing repairs, providing child care, Etc.? Q28 [Health and Life Profile (Interpersonal Support Evaluation List and Lubben Social Network Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPAA29
variable.description: Do you live alone or with other people? (note: circle the first response that applies). Q29 [Health and Life Profile (Interpersonal Support Evaluation List and Lubben Social Network Scale), exam 2]
variable.value: Live with other relatives, in-laws, or friends
Live with other unrelated individuals (e.g., paid help)

variable.name: HPAA31
variable.description: Type of administration. Q31 [Health and Life Profile (Interpersonal Support Evaluation List and Lubben Social Network Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Health and Life Profile (Interpersonal Support Evaluation List and Lubben Social Network Scale), exam 2]
